string.text:
A combat shotgun with both pump-action and semi-automatic firing modes, designed for military, law enforcement, and tactical applications. Its distinctive folding stock and robust construction allow for adaptability in both close-quarters combat and breaching operations. Known for its aggressive design and versatility, it has become one of the most recognizable shotguns in pop culture and military history.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Italy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Franchi
